ygData.subject: Re: You're here!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... SNIP SNIP Was wondering, how is it possible that some claim to make as much as 70 P in an hour? By following the previous posting, I d still be making as
ygData.messageBody:
>Well, I can't speak for him, but
>
>@ a skill of 115 (where pie tins become trivial)
>with a Cha of 90 I pay
>
>4s2c Block of Clay
>4s2c Block of Clay
>1s1c Sketch (pie tin)
>1s1c Water
>--------
>8s6c per unfired bowl attempt.
>
>with a success rate of 80.3 % at 115 ( this is over 158 attempts)
>you get a cost per unfired bowl of
>1/.803 * 8.6 = 10s1c per unfired bowl
>
>10s1c per unfired bowl
> 4s2c per High Quality Firing Sheet
>--------
>14s3c per fired tin attempt
>
>with a success rate of 96.1%

SNIP SNIP

Was wondering, how is it possible that some claim to make as much as 70 P in
an hour? By following the previous posting, I'd still be making as much per
hour brewing as I would if I did pottery. I'm not being greedy mind you, I
just need to earn enough cash to replace the cumbersome bronze armor I'm
wearing (my encumberances is 60 out of 72 due to the armor and my basic
equipment).
